definitions.definition: The member of staff at a restaurant who keeps the wine cellar and advises the guests on a choice of wines ; a wine steward / stewardess , a wine waiter / waitress / server .
examples: The sommelier recommended the perfect wine, opened the bottle with panache, and served it into glasses.

main_definition: The member of staff at a restaurant who keeps the wine cellar and advises the guests on a choice of wines ; a wine steward / stewardess , a wine waiter / waitress / server .
